content.en: Enhancing batch control: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the control performance and tracking accuracy in batch processes. These algorithms, such as IMC-based iterative learning control and time-parametrized LTV model, utilize advanced techniques to regulate the operation policy of batch processes and achieve superior tracking performance. By integrating different information and strategies, these algorithms aim to enhance control performance and robustness in batch processes with uncertainties and nonlinearity.
content.da: Forbedring af batchkontrol: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kontrolpræstation og sporingsnøjagtighed i batchprocesser. Disse algoritmer, såsom IMC-baseret iterativ læringskontrol og tid-parametriseret LTV-model, udnytter avancerede teknikker til at regulere driftsstrategien for batchprocesser og opnå overlegen sporingspræstation. Ved at integrere forskellige informationer og strategier sigter disse algoritmer mod at forbedre kontrolpræstation og robusthed i batchprocesser med usikkerheder og non-linearitet.
